tool_description: The Book Data Retrieval API is a powerful tool designed to seamlessly fetch comprehensive information about a vast array of books. Whether you're building a book catalog, developing a reading recommendation platform, or enhancing your e-commerce website's book section, this API provides a simple and efficient way to access detailed book data.
name: Books-API
title: Books-API

api_list.name: Random Book
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://books-api7.p.rapidapi.com/books/get/random/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "books-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://books-api7.p.rapidapi.com/books/get/random/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "books-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books by Genres
api_list.description: Gives books, which matches all the specified genres.

api_list.name: Books by Page count
api_list.description: Gives books, which matches the page count limit provided in batches, i.e. five per page.

api_list.name: Books by Rating
api_list.description: Gives books, which matches the rating limit in batches, i.e. five per page.

api_list.name: Book by Title
api_list.description: Gives book, that matches the title.

api_list.name: Books by Author
api_list.description: Gives books, which matches the name of the author.

api_list.name: Book by Id
api_list.description: Gives book, that matches the Id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://books-api7.p.rapidapi.com/books/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "books-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://books-api7.p.rapidapi.com/books/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "books-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Books per page
api_list.description: Gets details of books per page. Ten books are delivered per page, query parameter p acts as page number.
